channel.title: How to make a orange gun!
channel.description:
You will need: A pipe with a diameter of about 2 inches. there can be any length. The longer, the farther it shoots:one pipe with the diameter of 4 inches,the length does’nt matter,because you are going to cut it later. One sewer drain cap with the part that screw into it, this part should fit over the 4 inche diameter pipe. One replacement electric barbacue ignitor. One reducing coupling or bell reducer . Pipe glue make sure it’s fire proof and can withstand pressure. tools: You’ll need a drill n saw. Ammo: oranges, apples, potatoes... nefin that size. also, you ned hairspray how it works: Cut the pipe with the 4 inche diameter down to 16 or 17 inches. NEXT drill the ignitor in,if yours came with other parts connect those parts so you can see the spark then drill the sparking parts in, around the edges of the ignitor hole(s) glue it with super glue not the pipe glue then after that dryes glue the cap to the pipe. If you want to test to see if your doing it right go outside with the pipe you just cut, put the part that screws into the cap on and bring some hair spray with you out side. Spray the hair spray into the pipe hold it in there for a few seconds then press the ingitor button and stand back,If a flame shot out then you’re doing it right . Next glue the reducer on to the 4 inche diameter pipe that you just cut.. Last put the 2 inche diameter pipe into the reducer part of the other pipe, glue and let dry, it’s best to let dry for a day. let me know how this goes if u do it, its fun i tryed this and cops were called 2 days l8ta cuz i couldnt stop doing it, it was so fun! the cops ended up coming to my house but i had gone to my frineds house, my grandma said when i got home that they came and asked her about it then they started laughing when they saw it.
and one time me and my frineds tryed to shoot it at a house like 100m away and none of us thought it would make it that far, so i loaded it up with a freshlly frozen orange and can of hair spary, shot it...... not only did it hit the house it blew up one or two of the tiles on the roof omg we pissed our pants laughing, then the guy ran after me and he allmost cought me cuz i was laughin so hard i couldnt breathe\ just made it to my bike in time lol
[URL=http://img138.imageshack.us/my.php?image=lolgs1.jpg][IMG]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/695/lolgs1.th.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: How to make a orange gun!
item.dc:creator: @z_p_u_r_e_zz z p u r e zz
item.description:
@z_p_u_r_e_zz wrote:

You will need:
A pipe with a diameter of about 2 inches. there can be any length.
The longer, the farther it shoots:one pipe with the diameter of 4 inches,the length does’nt matter,because you are going to cut it later. One sewer drain cap with the part that screw into it, this part should fit over the 4 inche diameter pipe. One replacement electric barbacue ignitor. One reducing coupling or bell reducer . Pipe glue make sure it’s fire proof and can withstand pressure.
tools: You’ll need a drill n saw.
Ammo: oranges, apples, potatoes… nefin that size.
also, you ned hairspray
how it works:
Cut the pipe with the 4 inche diameter down to 16 or 17 inches. NEXT drill the ignitor in,if yours came with other parts connect those parts so you can see the spark then drill the sparking parts in, around the edges of the ignitor hole(s) glue it with super glue not the pipe glue then after that dryes glue the cap to the pipe. If you want to test to see if your doing it right go outside with the pipe you just cut, put the part that screws into the cap on and bring some hair spray with you out side. Spray the hair spray into the pipe hold it in there for a few seconds then press the ingitor button and stand back,If a flame shot out then you’re doing it right . Next glue the reducer on to the 4 inche diameter pipe that you just cut… Last put the 2 inche diameter pipe into the reducer part of the other pipe, glue and let dry, it’s best to let dry for a day.
let me know how this goes if u do it, its fun i tryed this and cops were called 2 days l8ta cuz i couldnt stop doing it, it was so fun! the cops ended up coming to my house but i had gone to my frineds house,
my grandma said when i got home that they came and asked her about it then they started laughing when
they saw it.

and one time me and my frineds tryed to shoot it at a house like 100m away and none of us thought it would make it that far, so i loaded it up with a freshlly frozen orange and can of hair spary, shot it…
not only did it hit the house it blew up one or two of the tiles on the roof omg we pissed our pants laughing, then the guy ran after me and he allmost cought me cuz i was laughin so hard i couldnt breathe
just made it to my bike in time lol
